title: Files Scanning... Again!!
body: Yep so as you know when patching the LoL client, the majority of us get stuck at 33% with files scanning. And that is me right now >:|  no I don't want to delete the RAD files and wait another several hours waiting to patch.. I have currently scanned 2200 files and still going. What is the problem and why do so many people go through this same thing what is wrong with the client RIOT? And has anyone found a solution without deleting shit or reinstalling without waiting more and more hours for it to do a quick update and start playing?
